title: You know i'd actually respect Riven players
body:
If she wasn't the most mobile champion in the game. If she didn't have low enough cooldowns that she can just rapid fire them in quick succession with no thought process at all because they're all ridiculously low to begin with. If she didn't scale off one single stat only. If she wasn't a cancerous piece of shit that's probably the worst designed champion in the game.

Yeah, i'm mad. Mad because she makes terrible players look good.

replies.body:
Terrible players on Riven don't look good. 

Between bad Q jumps, canceled autos, mistimed dashes and missed ults. It's like the entire champion kit was designed around giving people content for funny/fails highlight videos.
I agree with most of what you said, but i personally think her kit is unique and well designed
Riven actually takes a decent amount of skill to use. Her combos are quite tricky to pull off 100% of the time. Go try playing her yourself and see how well you do
